query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notification_preferences (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  video_analysis_enabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  agent_task_enabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  interview_question_enabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  matching_enabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  email_notifications INT DEFAULT 1,
  push_notifications INT DEFAULT 1,
  sound_enabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_id (user_id)
)
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  video_analysis_enabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  agent_task_enabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  interview_question_enabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  matching_enabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  email_notifications INT DEFAULT 1,
  push_notifications INT DEFAULT 1,
  sound_enabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_id (user_id)
)
